---
title: "devtesting"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
data("example_data")

df <- example_data
timepoint_col <- "timepoint"
item_col <- "item"
value_col <- "value"

```

```{r}
prepare_table(
  df,
  timepoint_col,
  item_col,
  value_col
  ) %>%
  output_table_html(
    item_label = "item",
    history_style = "line"
  )
  
```

```{r}
prepare_table(
  df,
  timepoint_col,
  item_col,
  value_col,
  history_type = "delta"
  ) %>%
  output_table(
    item_label = "item",
    history_style = "bar"
  )
  
```
